text: Premchand Aggarwal is an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Aggarwal is a member of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly from the Rishikesh constituency in Dehradun district where he has a residence. He is originally from Doiwala. He has been MLA for Rishikesh consecutively in three terms since 2007 Assembly election. In the 2017 Assembly election he defeated his nearest rival Rajpal Singh Kharola of Indian National Congress by the margin of 14,801 votes. As of March 2017, he is the current Speaker of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly as he was elected unopposed by the newly elected members.Two-time MLA faces anti-incumbencyMy NetaSitting and previous MLAs from Rishikesh Assembly Constituency == References == Category:People from Rishikesh Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttarakhand Category:Members of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:Uttarakhand MLAs 2017– Category:Speakers of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly Category:1960 births
title: Premchand Aggarwal
